remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的托管的包装[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏功能。The class provides a managed wrapper for [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar functionality. 有关 Windows 外壳程序和本机任务栏 Api 的详细信息，请参阅[任务栏扩展](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479)。For more information about the Windows shell and native taskbar APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479). 作为公开依赖项属性。 is exposed as the dependency property on a . [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供增强的功能，使你能够使用任务栏项目以传达给用户的状态，并且最小化的窗口或将其隐藏公开常见任务。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar item to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 通过公开的功能类不可在 Windows 的版本比[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality that is exposed by the class is unavailable in versions of Windows earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 应用程序使用类仍可以在早期版本的 Windows 中运行; 但是，这些任务栏增强功能在早期版本中不可用。Applications that use the class can still run in earlier versions of Windows; however, these taskbar enhancements are unavailable in the earlier versions. 在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，任务栏的部分功能可能不可用，具体取决于用户的设置。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some taskbar functionality might be unavailable, depending on the user's settings. 例如，任务栏功能将不可用如果[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)]被禁用或如果启动应用程序使用提升的权限。For example, taskbar functionality is unavailable if [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] is disabled or if the application is started with elevated permissions. 你的应用程序应提供的其他方式与用户交互，不依赖于中的增强的任务栏功能[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。Your application should provide other ways to interact with the user that do not depend on the enhanced taskbar functionality in [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在通知区域中，这是在任务栏最右侧，程序图标通常用于传达给用户的应用程序状态。Program icons in the notification area, which is at the far right of the taskbar, are typically used to communicate application status to a user. 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏隐藏通知区域中的程序图标。By default, the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar hides program icons in the notification area. 但是，您可以设置属性将图像添加到任务栏按钮以传达状态，如消息处理应用程序中的联机状态。However, you can set the property to add an image to the taskbar button to communicate status, such as online status in a messaging application. 将覆盖图像允许用户查看应用程序状态，即使它们不能看到的通知区域中的程序图标。The overlay image lets users see the application status even if they cannot see the program icon in the notification area. 你也可以显示通过设置任务栏按钮中运行任务的进度和属性。You can also display the progress of running tasks in the taskbar button by setting the and properties. [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏显示应用程序的缩略图时你将鼠标指针移到任务栏按钮。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar displays a thumbnail of the application when you move the mouse pointer over the taskbar button. 默认情况下显示整个应用程序窗口。By default the whole application window is shown. 你可以指定窗口，以通过设置显示缩略图中的特定部分属性。You can specify a particular part of the window to display in the thumbnail by setting the property. 你还可以指定任务栏缩略图上方的工具提示中显示。You can also specify a that is displayed in a tooltip above the taskbar thumbnail. 即使在由于用户设置而无法查看缩略图时，将显示工具提示。The tooltip is displayed even when the thumbnail cannot be seen because of user settings. 可以将按钮添加到任务栏缩略图用于访问常见任务而无需切换到应用程序窗口。You can add buttons to the taskbar thumbnail to provide access to common tasks without switching to the application window. 例如，窗口媒体播放器提供，暂停，正向播放，并让你的后退按钮控制媒体从任务栏缩略图的播放应用程序最小化时。For example, Window Media Player provides Play, Pause, Forward, and Back buttons that let you control media playback from the taskbar thumbnail when the application is minimized. 在任务栏缩略图中的按钮都由对象，并包含在集合。Buttons in the taskbar thumbnail are represented by objects and are contained in the collection. 下图显示的增强的功能[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏。The following illustration shows the enhanced features of the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar. ![任务栏项目信息示例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "任务栏项目信息示例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 任务栏增强功能Windows Taskbar Enhanced Features ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 包含一套提供从任务栏项目的播放和停止命令的访问的对象。The contains a collection of objects that provide access to the Play and Stop commands from the taskbar item.
